name: untitled text baced adventure game - alpha v0.2
name_original: untitled text baced adventure game - alpha v0.2
description:
it is a prototype game testing the idea of a text baced adventure game with a minimalistic UI.

the game at the moment goes for about 3 min so I would not recommend getting it for the reason of actually playing it. it is still in alpha so I would recommend only getting it if you are a play tester.

I am trying out an Idea where the is lots of different things you can say to NPC's and soon I will make it so those things you say will affect the gameplay and ending of the game.

so far there is no fighting or currency, but that will come out in the 0.25 update. the 0.25 update is the second half of the 0.2 update that I posted about yesterday.

as you can see on the screenshots, at the moment all you can do is talk to people. 

please comment if there is any bugs that you find, I could not find any so if you find some It will improve the quality of the game.
